title: Corda External Messaging Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the external messaging.

channels.description: A list containing the configuration for each channel.

name.$comment: The name of the channels accepts alphanumeric values, underscores, periods, and dashes. Empty strings are not accepted and the max. length is 100 characters. Also topics with a period . or underscore _ could collide in internal data structures, so you are advised to use either but not both.
name.description: The name of the channel to which external services can listen to for messages.

type.description: Specifies whether a channel is uni or bi-directional, i.e., if external services can use the channel to only receive messages or also send messages.
